Text: Trump loyalists roaming U.S. streets with bats and clubs, alongside the police looking for protestors and others to beat. #ICantBreathe #GeorgeFloyd #BlackLivesMatter #TrumpDictatorship https://t.co/Q85Ca0FnEA

We have now watched an armed attack, instigated by the president of the United States, on peaceful, law-abiding demonstrators exercising their Constitutional rights. All of Trump's actions and words have etched today as a grim moment in American history.

#BunkerBoy Trump had to prove he could walk in broad daylight today so he sicced the police on peaceful protesters so he could stand there and awkwardly hold the Bible.  Dear God.  We need to end this nightmare of a presidency.
Sad day in 🇺🇸 when many business owners weren thrown in jail for opening their businesses during #Covid19 but you don't get arrested when you burn and loot one down! #Riot2020 #Bible #protests2020

Today is International Sex Workers' Day.UNAIDS and @GlobalSexWork call on countries to take immediate, critical action to protect the health and rights of sex workers during the #COVID19 pandemic. #ISWD2020

The Trump regime declared Antifa a terrorist organisation and then declared all protestors Antifa; this is a move to legitimise killing civilians. Trump has defined the terms of engagement of the Civil War he is inciting, it is not Black vs White it is Fascist vs Antifascist.
Trump is unable to take responsibility for what he's done and haven't done enough, and he will never apologize.Do not expect him to back down. Expect him to escalate.#BlackLivesMattter
